Detailed Description

Class that models a confrim option window pop up from the chisimba core modules.

It basically an interface class between the hosportal module and the chisimba core modules. This creates less dependancy on chisimba and increases flexibility and maintainability. This confirm object is a small popup window that asks a question with an OK or Cancel button

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern
School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010

Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this class

Member Function Documentation

createNewObjectFromModule ( $  name_of_class = 'confirm',
$  name_of_module = 'utilities' 
)

Creates an object from the chisimba core modules.

Parameters:
name_of_class A string with default value set to no other than the confirm class.
name_of_module A string with default value set to the module in which the confirm class is stored.
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this member function.
Returns:
A new confirm object to be used.

Return an new empty confirm action object.

If you called this method without any arguments (parameters), don't sweat it, the default arguments will take care of everything.

Definition at line 37 of file confirm_module_class_inc.php.

setConfirmOptions ( $  link = NULL,
$  url = NULL,
$  message = NULL,
$  extra = NULL 
)

Member function give the confirm object functionality and substance.

Parameters:
link It can be any variable type for the link in which the confirm object will be triggered and displayed. Examples would be objects like links, icons, buttons and even normal strings.
url It is a variable type string or an url array. If the OK button is clicked, then it will go to this url.
message It is a variable type string. It will set and display whatever string you want to display.
extra It is a variable any variable type. If the OK button is clicked, then it can perform any function desired.
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this member function.
Returns:
A beefed up confirm object that is ready to be displayed when triggered.

Returns a member function from the confirm class of the chisimba core modules.

If you call this method without any arguments, you would not be setting anything.

Definition at line 65 of file confirm_module_class_inc.php.

showConfirmMessage (  ) 

Method to display the confirm pop up window when it is triggered by the $link variable.

Returns:
A member function from the confirm class of the chisimba core modules.

Once the confirm message object has been completely modelled, this can allow you to display it whenever it is triggered.

Definition at line 75 of file confirm_module_class_inc.php.

Field Documentation

$objConfirm [private]

Private data member of class confirm_module that stores a object of another class.

This class is composed of one object from the confirm class in the utilities module of chisimba. This object models a confirm pop up window object.
